this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - light grey red and black - yarn needle - scissors final size - diameter of 6 cm technical notes *rounds 1 and 2 are joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern body black round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic circle make 10 half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first st followed by 3 double_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st 5 sts *fasten_off wings light grey make two round 1 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts then make 1 single_crochet in the next st then make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st in the last st make 5 half_double_crochet * now you should notice your work is turning let it turn and continue working on the other side now make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st 1 single_crochet in the next st finally make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts 13 sts fasten_off and sew the wings on cut about 20 cm cut about 8 cm of leave a 15 cm yarn of red yarn make black yarn to tail the eyes make the mouth then make the legs link to video https //youtu be/74ysut-lddq if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
